sources.title: Stop Press Girl
sources.description: Title: Stop Press Girl Summary: An attractive young girl has the power to stop all kinds of machinery. Directed by: Michael Barry Actors: Sally Ann Howes, Gordon Jackson, Basil Radford Production Company: Aquila Film Release Date: 1 June 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An attractive young girl has the power to stop all kinds of machinery.

metadata.Plot: An attractive young girl has the power to stop all kinds of machinery.
metadata.Actors: Sally Ann Howes, Gordon Jackson, Basil Radford
